Html: My app has an OutlookBar from the Odyssey project.  The bar itself is a region, and I have created a region adapter for the OutlookBar control.  I lazy load modules based on permissions after login.  Each module adds a new section to the OutlookBarRegion when it loads.  If each OutlookBar section contains a region, that region is scoped to the module such that each module could have its own region with the same name.  Am I correct in thinking this?

On our project we manually created a ScopedRegion in order to be able to load a control and all its related region in it. We are planning to include an OutlookBar too. Have you tried your suggested solution ?

I was having an issue with binding and my region adapter wasn't perfect.  Also, the OutlookBar ItemsSource property isn't hooked up so for the time being, I'm skipping its use.  Perhaps I'll come back to it later.
